question: [Explain] Deutsch: Gib which integer bin occurs most frequently anhand des Histogramms an.

qas.question: [Explain] Deutsch: Gib which integer bin occurs most frequently anhand des Histogramms an.
[Study] Portugues: Informe how many samples were used in total com base no histograma.
[Explain] Polski: Podaj how many entries fall inside the modal bin na podstawie histogramu.
